page.title: 04THOUGHTS ON WOLLASTON
page.content: I like{Wollaston}because it is nicely placed between town and country. It is a pleasant village in which to live. Most of the time it is peaceful and quiet, yet it has enough life not to be boring. It does have some faults, it does not have its own library, school clinic or swimming baths, we have to go to the nearest town of{Stourbridge}for these facilities. We only have one small bank branch, and a very inconveniently placed post office in the village. In fact, away from the centre of{ {Wollaston,}shops and facilities are few.{Wollaston}has plenty of community spirit however, it has provided clubs, community centres and activities through its own resources. I like living in{Wollaston. { { Julian Roberts (St.James's Primary)
